name: Bjorn J Jungco
coverLetter:
No previous trimming experience but I am a very fast learner and is able to adapt very well. I am a DIY kind of person and is very good with creating systems that will easily make me one of the most efficient trimmers around. 

I am a long time cannabis aficionado and would like to see what its like on the growing side of things. 

I am 30 years old and very responsible. I`ve had sales jobs that required me to manage my own time and efforts ( Commission based ) I work also as a photographer freelance so I can dedicate a lot of time for trimming and managing these beautiful plants.
